vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Hos.1.3;
father of: Gomer (H1586H)
§ Diblaim = "two cakes"
the father of Hosea's wife Gomer
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Gómer, esposa de profeta Oseas
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
滴拉音 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "兩塊糕"
何西阿妻子歌篾的父親 (何1:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
滴拉音 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "两块糕"
何西阿妻子歌篾的父亲 (何1:3)
